programme.title: Freeride World Tour - Heroes
programme.desc: The best riders at the best mountains - that´s the Freeride World Tour! We´re going to introduce some of the key players of the tour, from experienced veterans to hungry rookies.

programme.title: FIA Karting Grand Prix
programme.desc: At Lonato in Italy, the world’s leading KZ gearbox kart racers will quest for glory to take the ultimate accolade - the title of world champion. Also this weekend, the KZ2 drivers will race for the International Supercup.

programme.title: Racing Unleashed
programme.desc: A virtual racing game that makes the pilots sweat – this is not fiction but reality since the start of Racing Unleashed.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2023 - stop #4 - Fieberbrunn Pro (AUT)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Freeride World Tour 2023 "Live Summary"
programme.desc: The Freeride World Tour 2023 has its fourth stop in Fieberbrunn, Austria - as always with the best freeriders from all over the world! The first part of the FWT finals takes place in Fieberbrunn, where the athletes have to conquer the imposing Wildseeloder.

programme.title: Actionclip GKA22 BigAir ESP Hydrofoil Recap
programme.desc: Actionclip GKA22 BigAir ESP Hydrofoil Recap

programme.title: Loic and the Flolopapys
programme.desc: Loic, Pierre,Pabloand Florian are climbers. Together they form the inseparable “Flolopapys” but can Loic use the Flolopapys energy to overcome his haunting fear of heights as he confronts some of the toughest climbs on the planet?

programme.title: LAAX Open - Freestyle Dokumentation
programme.desc: It’s a giant amongst giants, the dream combination of Swiss engineering and American craftsmanship and undoubtedly one of the best halfpipes: it’s the legendary Laax superpipe.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2020 - #2 Canada
programme.desc: The second stage of the tour will revisit champagne powder paradise Kicking Horse near Golden, British Columbia (CAN).

programme.title: Cape Epic 2021 - Prolog
programme.desc: The Absa Cape Epic is the world's premier mountain bike stage race. The route changes every year and takes ambitious amateur and professional mountain bikers from all over the world over 650 untamed kilometres through pristine landscapes.

programme.title: Cape Epic 2021 - Stage 1
programme.desc: The Absa Cape Epic is the world's premier mountain bike stage race. The route changes every year and takes ambitious amateur and professional mountain bikers from all over the world over 650 untamed kilometres through pristine landscapes.

programme.title: WES E-Bike World Series #1 & #2
programme.desc: In der heutigen Folge werfen wir einen Blick auf die erste und zweite Runde der World E-Bike Series 2023 in Monaco und Bologna, Italien. Aber wer kann die Rennen der Männer und Frauen gewinnen? Lasst es uns herausfinden!

programme.title: European Freestyle Pro Tour 2023 - Mid Season Recap
programme.desc: Die ersten Events der European Freestyle Pro Tour 2023 sind vorbei und wir werfen einen Blick zurück auf die besten Windsurfer der Welt und ihre epischen Tricks auf dem Wasser.

programme.title: Ötztaler Radmarathon 2023
programme.desc: Der Ötztaler Radmarathon 2023 (AUT) ist der anspruchsvollste Radmarathon der Alpen und besticht durch seinen Mix aus Tal- und Hochgebirgslandschaften, die zu einer einzigartigen Atmosphäre beitragen.

programme.title: Mystic Skate Cup 2023
programme.desc: In dieser Episode ist es soweit: Der Mystic Skate Cup 2023 in Prag, Tschechische Republik, steht vor der Tür. Einige der besten Skateboarder der Welt werden ihr Können zeigen und das Event zu einem Spektakel machen. Werfen wir einen Blick darauf!

programme.title: E-Bike World Tour 2022 - Flachau (AUT)
programme.desc: The E-Race at the Flachau E-Bike Festival 2022 is probably one of the most spectacular races in e-bike sport and brings an international squad of top riders to Flachau.

programme.title: FIA Karting European Champioships
programme.desc: World Champion and European Champion in Karting. The CIK-FIA presents the most up-to-date Championships which bring together the best drivers and the greatest hopefuls of motor sport of the future during races of an incredible intensity.

programme.title: ON Surf
programme.desc: ON Surf - A Collection of Italian Surf Movie Classics. Starring the most inspiring surfers around the globe including Leah Dawson, Ale Ponzanelli and many more.

programme.title: Motosurf World Championship - Båstad (SWE)
programme.desc: Set against the stunning backdrop of the Swedish coastline, the world’s best motosurfers are ready to go head-to-head. Speed, skill, and pure passion - these are the ingredients for thrilling races on the water. Who will claim the title here in Båstad?

programme.title: Profile - Xavier de le Rue (Snowboarding)
programme.desc: The myth - that is Xavier de le Rue will be our guide and will give us a unique chance to experience the mountain from his point of view when serious business starts - so strap yourself in and get ready for this ride!

programme.title: Adidas Outdoor Sports Team - Freestyle Kayak
programme.desc: "Go big or go home!" – four athletes in search of the perfect wave. Their quest takes them from Africa to North America. In order to push their sport to its limits!

programme.title: Island Durchquerung
programme.desc: Hans Rey and Steve Peat want to be the first mountain bikers to do a real North to South traverse of Iceland, one of the largest volcanic island in the world. They choose the month of August for their adventure.

programme.title: FIA Karting World Championships
programme.desc: The world championship for karting in the OK direct drive category for junior and senior racers is finally upon us, as the field descends on Kartodromo Algarve in Portimao, Portugal, just two weeks after Formula One returned to this country.

programme.title: King of the Court 2020 - Women
programme.desc: King of the Court 2020 in Utrecht, Netherlands is the first international top sport event restarted on Dutch soil in collaboration with the FIVB.

programme.title: Cape Epic 2021 - Stage 2
programme.desc: The Absa Cape Epic is the world's premier mountain bike stage race. The route changes every year and takes ambitious amateur and professional mountain bikers from all over the world over 650 untamed kilometres through pristine landscapes.

programme.title: Cape Epic 2021 - Stage 3
programme.desc: The Absa Cape Epic is the world's premier mountain bike stage race. The route changes every year and takes ambitious amateur and professional mountain bikers from all over the world over 650 untamed kilometres through pristine landscapes.

programme.title: Motosurf World Championship - Båstad (SWE)
programme.desc: Set against the stunning backdrop of the Swedish coastline, the world’s best motosurfers are ready to go head-to-head. Speed, skill, and pure passion - these are the ingredients for thrilling races on the water. Who will claim the title here in Båstad?

programme.title: People in Motion
programme.desc: People of Motion is a sport documentary about a group of people who turn to parkour in their lives -- sometimes to get rid of frustration, sometimes just to feel the ground and be part of something.

programme.title: GKA Kitesurfing World Tour 2023 - The Stars of Big Air
programme.desc: Heute machen wir einen großen Sprung zur GKA Kitesurfing World Tour 2023. Einige der besten Surfer der Welt messen sich in der spektakulärsten Kiteboarding-Disziplin - dem Big Air.

programme.title: SPAR Swiss Epic 2023
programme.desc: Vom 15. bis 19. August kämpfen Zweierteams im malerischen Graubünden um den Gesamtsieg und wichtige UCI-Mountainbike-Punkte beim Swiss Epic. Mit mehr als 350km und fast 12.000 Höhenmetern wird den besten Mountainbikern alles abverlangt.

programme.title: Motosurf World Championship - Båstad (SWE)
programme.desc: Set against the stunning backdrop of the Swedish coastline, the world’s best motosurfers are ready to go head-to-head. Speed, skill, and pure passion - these are the ingredients for thrilling races on the water. Who will claim the title here in Båstad?

programme.title: Roopkund - Der geheimnisvolle See
programme.desc: Following the adventure mountain biker Hans Rey and his team to the Indian Himalayas. Their goal: reach the mysterious Roopkund Lake, a glacial lake in the Uttarakhand region!

programme.title: Gasherbrum II - Expedition
programme.desc: It was one of the last blank spots on the map of alpinism: the winter ascent of an eight-thousander at Pakistan’s Karakoram mountains.

programme.title: THE RIO CAQUETA
programme.desc: Jules Domine and Tyler Bradt, obsessed and addicted to whitewater adventure, make a plan to journey the long way, from the source of Rio Caqueta 1,000 Kilometers downstream to an unreal big water canyon deep in the Colombian Amazon.

programme.title: ITF Beach Tennis World Tour 2023 - Sand Series Saarlouis Classic (GER)
programme.desc: Die Sand Series kehrt noch in diesem Monat an den Ort zurück, an dem alles begann: nach Saarlouis, wo die Serie 2021 erstmals stattfand. Der ehemalige Weltranglistenerste Michele Cappelletti wird zum ersten Mal mit André Baran antreten.

programme.title: WES E-Bike World Series Round #3 & #4
programme.desc: In der heutigen Episode reisen wir nach Italien und Belgien zu Runde 3 und 4 der World E-Bike Series. Die weltbesten Mountainbikerinnen und Mountainbiker werden darum kämpfen, wer in der Mitte des Rennkalenders die Führung übernimmt.

programme.title: FIA Karting European Championships
programme.desc: In der heutigen Episode besuchen wir die zukünftigen Formular 1 Stars bei der FIA Karting Europameisterschaft 2023 in Cremona, Italien. Schnallen Sie sich an und starten Sie Ihre Motoren, denn wir werden gleich auf Platz 1 fahren.

programme.title: BetCity Royal Championships Queen & King of the Court 2023
programme.desc: Dieses Turnier ist größer als je zuvor, die besten Spieler der Welt kommen vom 5. bis 10. September nach 'Manhattan an der Maas'. Ein 'königliches' Stadion direkt im Stadtzentrum am Henegouwerplein ist der Schauplatz und Nebenplätze in den Vororten umrahmen dieses Ereignis.

programme.title: Motosurf World Championship - Båstad (SWE)
programme.desc: Set against the stunning backdrop of the Swedish coastline, the world’s best motosurfers are ready to go head-to-head. Speed, skill, and pure passion - these are the ingredients for thrilling races on the water. Who will claim the title here in Båstad?

programme.title: Qatar Airways GKA Big Air World Championships 2022
programme.desc: In todays episode we´re going on another trip with our favorite Kite Sport Athletes. This time we are heading to Tarifa in Spain for the World first Big Air World Championships in several disciplines.

programme.title: King of the Court Crown Series 2022 - Hamburg (GER)
programme.desc: The King of the Court Crown Series 2022 will be unprecedented. Five tournaments, a total of four continents visited and millions of fans from all over the globe that can experience the best beach volleyball action ever seen!

programme.title: E-Bike World Tour 2022 - Tignes & Val d’Isère (FRA)
programme.desc: As the second stop of the 2022 E-Bike World Tour, the UCI-accredited E-Tour de Haute-Tarentaise attracted professional and experienced amateur riders from different nations for two days of sublime stage racing across 85km of high alpine terrain.

programme.title: Red Bull Romaniacs 2022 (ROU)
programme.desc: The Red Bull Romaniacs Extreme Enduro Rally was created in 2004 and takes place for the 19th time this year. The race is spread over five days, the first being the inner-city prologue in front of thousands of enthusiastic fans.

programme.title: Red Bull Romaniacs 2024 - Sibiu (ROU) - 150min Leatt LiveManiacs Summary
programme.desc: Bei der diesjährigen 21. Auflage der Red Bull Romaniacs werden Teilnehmer aus rund 60 Nationen antreten, darunter die weltbesten Hard-Enduro-Fahrer wie Manuel Lettenbichler (GER), Graham Jarvis (UK), Wade Young (RSA), Michael Walkner (AUT) und Teodor Kabakchiev (BUL).

programme.title: Audi Nines - Nothing Quite Like It
programme.desc: “Nothing Quite Like It” explores why these athletes throw themselves off jumps the size of houses.

programme.title: Winter Games Obsidian - Big Air
programme.desc: Winter Games NZ is the Southern Hemisphere’s biggest snow sports event. It welcomes the world’s best skiers and snowboarders to compete in the opening of the FIS Park and Pipe World Cup season and The North Face Frontier.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2020 - #3 Andorra
programme.desc: The third part of the FWT 2020 will take place in Andorra. The Freeride World Tour is a worldwide competition of freeride snowboarding and skiing, where the best riders in the world compete against each other.

programme.title: FIA Karting European Championship - Kristianstad (SWE)
programme.desc: FIA Karting European ChampionshipsThis time we are in Sweden to have a look at a rather unusual motorsport event. Almost every motorsport pilot has started his carrer in a Kart. Let´s see how europe´s new pilot generation is doing on the scandinavian course.

programme.title: WES E-Bike World Series #5 & World Rookie Tour Finals
programme.desc: In der heutigen Episode machen wir einen Städtetrip: Zuerst schauen wir bei der WES E-Bike World Series in Bielstein, Deutschland, vorbei und dann geht's weiter zum Finale der World Rookie Tour und ihren jungen Skatetalente in Innbruck.

programme.title: GKA Kitesurfing World Tour The Stars of Freestyle

programme.desc: The Ultra-Trail du Mont-Blanc© - Edition 2018171 kilometers - 10,000 meters ascent - 2,300 runnersFor the 2018 UTMB© Damian Hall is ranked 50th by the International Trail Running Association© (ITRA© ).

programme.title: FIA Karting European Championship - Kristianstad (SWE)
programme.desc: FIA Karting European ChampionshipsThis time we are in Sweden to have a look at a rather unusual motorsport event. Almost every motorsport pilot has started his carrer in a Kart. Let´s see how europe´s new pilot generation is doing on the scandinavian course.

programme.title: E-Bike World Tour 2022 - Verbier (SUI)
programme.desc: The Verbier E-Bike Festival has earned its special place in the heart of the e-bike community thanks to hosting the most iconic e-bike race of them all.

programme.title: Trans Madeira 2023 Autumn: Full Highlights
programme.desc: Trans Madeira combines the best things the island has to offer with five days of racing, starting high in the mountains and finishing down at the ocean. Get ready for 220km of riding, 30 special stages, exploring North, South, East and West in one mega week!

programme.title: Trans Madeira 2023 Summer: Full Highlights
programme.desc: Trans Madeira combines the best things the island has to offer with five days of racing, starting high in the mountains and finishing down at the ocean. Get ready for 220km of riding, 30 special stages, exploring North, South, East and West in one mega week!

programme.title: Loic and the Flolopapys
programme.desc: Loic, Pierre,Pabloand Florian are climbers. Together they form the inseparable “Flolopapys” but can Loic use the Flolopapys energy to overcome his haunting fear of heights as he confronts some of the toughest climbs on the planet?

programme.title: Sickline - Die Dokumentation
programme.desc: 150 der weltbesten Wildwasserkajakfahrer aus zahlreichen Ländern treffen sich, um auf der legendären "Wellerbrücke" den Sickline Extreme Kayak World Champion zu ermitteln. Die Strecke hat den Ruf, die Eiger-Nordwand des Wildwasserkajaksports zu sein und bietet somit die perfekte Kulisse, um den Weltmeister im Extremkajak-Rennsport zu küren

programme.title: LINE OF SIGHT | A Look into Wingsuit BASE Jumping
programme.desc: The golden age of wingsuiting is upon us. Through evolving suit technology the initial inflation time has gone down, which has lead to quicker starts and more exits. Wingsuit athletes Marshal Miller, Jesse Hall, and Sean Chuma take you through the iconic jumps.

programme.title: Profile - Aurelien Routens (Freeride Snowboard)
programme.desc: Aurelien Routens from France is a free-spirited, adventurous snowboarder who has excelled in competition and exploration, having numerous first descents to his name. He was runner-up in the 2013 Freeride World Tour.

programme.title: Ride Aletsch - Geraldine Fasnacht
programme.desc: In this Episode we accompany Geraldine Fasnacht on her adventure to ride the famous Aletsch Glacier. A lightweight airplane and former Freeride World Tour Champion Emilien Badoux help her to fulfill her dream.

programme.title: Mission Antarctica
programme.desc: Xavier de Le Rue, multiple freeride world champion and two times Olympian returned from a trip to Antarctica with mixed feelings, although he had the experience of a lifetime and discovered a new paradise he believed he had only scratched the surface of it.

programme.title: FIA Karting European Championship - Kristianstad (SWE)
programme.desc: FIA Karting European ChampionshipsThis time we are in Sweden to have a look at a rather unusual motorsport event. Almost every motorsport pilot has started his carrer in a Kart. Let´s see how europe´s new pilot generation is doing on the scandinavian course.

programme.title: Cape Epic 2021 - Stage 4
programme.desc: The Absa Cape Epic is the world's premier mountain bike stage race. The route changes every year and takes ambitious amateur and professional mountain bikers from all over the world over 650 untamed kilometres through pristine landscapes.

programme.title: Cape Epic 2021 - Stage 5
programme.desc: The Absa Cape Epic is the world's premier mountain bike stage race. The route changes every year and takes ambitious amateur and professional mountain bikers from all over the world over 650 untamed kilometres through pristine landscapes.

programme.title: Athlete Profile Marcel Remy
programme.desc: When you hear the name Remy, the first people climbers generally think of are Claude and Yves. For more than thirty years, Mammut has supported and accompanied the two climbers with their projects.

programme.title: Ötztaler Radmarathon 2022
programme.desc: After many months of preparation, on Sunday, 28th of August, the most legendary cycling event for amateur athletes and road cycling enthusiasts celebrates its 41th edition.

programme.title: SPAR Swiss Epic
programme.desc: From August 16 - 20, teams of two will compete in Switzerland’s pictures Graubünden region for the overall victory and important UCI mountain bike points at the Swiss Epic.

programme.title: Vanora ENGADINWIND by Dakine
programme.desc: This year it's FOIL MANIA on Lake Silvaplana in the Engadin. On the occasion of the iQ Foil Youth & Junior World Championship, the world's best windsurfers travel to Switzerland for the event.

programme.title: Enfer & Paradis
programme.desc: Justine Dupont is on her way to be the world's best female surfer. Enfer & Paradis accompanies her in her everyday life as well as on the biggest wave in the world - Nazaré and offers insights behind the scenes of the first mixed surfing world championship.

programme.title: Simple Session 2024 - Skate Final
programme.desc: Simple Session wurde im Jahr 2000 ins Leben gerufen und hat sich von einem Kleinstadt-Wettbewerb zu einem der größten und renommiertesten BMX- und Skateboard-Wettbewerbe der Welt entwickelt. Die Simple Session 24 kehrt am 24.-25. August in ihre Heimatstadt Tartu zurück.

programme.title: Skitouren Dokumentation
programme.desc: Weiße Gipfel, einsame Hänge und unberührte Natur: Skibergsteigen ist der größte alpine Trend und die wohl am schnellsten wachsende Bergsportart.

programme.title: Meet Connor Herson
programme.desc: Connor Herson pushes the limits of what is possible on the rock. But his latest and greatest challenge? Balancing a life climbing cutting edge ascents with his studies at Stanford.

programme.title: FIA Karting European Championship - Kristianstad (SWE)
programme.desc: FIA Karting European ChampionshipsThis time we are in Sweden to have a look at a rather unusual motorsport event. Almost every motorsport pilot has started his carrer in a Kart. Let´s see how europe´s new pilot generation is doing on the scandinavian course.

programme.title: World Rowing Beach Sprint Finals 2023
programme.desc: In der heutigen Folge haben wir ein besonderes Format der World Rowing Tour. In Barletta, Italien, finden die Beach Sprint Finals von 2023 statt. Auf dem Mittelmeer kämpfen die Athleten um den Titel des diesjährigen Champions. Schauen wir mal rein!

programme.title: Titan Desert Series 2023 - Almería (ESP)
programme.desc: Der Škoda Titan Desert Almería ist viel mehr als ein MTB-Rennen. Es ist ein viertägiges Abenteuer, mit ständigen sportlichen und persönlichen Herausforderungen. Ein einzigartiges Erlebnis, bei dem man seine Grenzen auf dem Bike messen und Erfahrungen mit dem Rest des Titan Camps teilen kann.

programme.title: GKA Kitesurfing World Tour - The Stars of Wave
programme.desc: In der heutigen Folge ist es wieder Zeit für die GKA Kitesurfing World Tour 2023. Nachdem wir bereits das Highlight der Kitesurfing Freestyler gesehen haben, gehen wir nun zu den Kite-Surf Wave Athleten über und rekapitulieren das Highlight der ersten Saisonhälfte. Let's check out!

programme.title: European Freestyle Pro Tour 2023 - Geneva (SUI)
programme.desc: Heute besuchen wir die wunderschöne Stadt Genf in der Schweiz für die European Freestyle Pro Tour 2023. Auf dem atemberaubenden "Lac Leman" zeigen einige der besten Windsurfer der Welt ihr Können in den Disziplinen Foilstyle und Tow-In. Schauen wir uns ein bisschen Wasser-Action an!

programme.title: WES World E-Bike Series #6 & #7
programme.desc: WES ist die erste Weltmeisterschaft, die nur für E-Bikes bestimmt ist, der einzige UCI-E-Mountainbike-Cross-Country-Weltcup, zu dem auch das E-Bike-Fest, gehört. Es handelt sich um ein Doppelrennen an einem Wochenende mit einem Rundkurs von 3 bis 4 km Länge.

programme.title: Titan Desert Series 2023 - Neom (KSA)
programme.desc: Die NEOM Titan Desert Saudi-Arabien macht ihrem mächtigen Namen alle Ehre. Bei diesem Ausdauer- und Orientierungsrennen für Mountainbiker, das durch die bergige Wüste von NEOM führt, müssen die Fahrer in vier intensiven Etappen um den Sieg kämpfen.

programme.title: Actionclip GKA22 BigAir ESP Hydrofoil Highlights
programme.desc: Actionclip GKA22 BigAir ESP Hydrofoil Highlights

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2020 - #3 Andorra
programme.desc: The third part of the FWT 2020 will take place in Andorra. The Freeride World Tour is a worldwide competition of freeride snowboarding and skiing, where the best riders in the world compete against each other.

programme.title: Alaska or Bus´t - Profile Andrew Taylor
programme.desc: Alaska, one of the most sparsely populated areas in the world, has always been a dream-riding destination for American mountain biker Andrew Taylor. But being over 3,000 miles away from his hometown, it seemed a bit too far to just jump in the truck and go.

programme.title: FIA - Pure Motorsport "Documentary | The Restart"
programme.desc: Covid-19 brought the world of motorsport to a complete standstill. However, this standstill was overcome through the joint effort and passion of volunteers, promoters, teams, drivers and FIA officials. They managed the successful RESTART.

programme.title: Athlete Profile Marcel Remy
programme.desc: When you hear the name Remy, the first people climbers generally think of are Claude and Yves. For more than thirty years, Mammut has supported and accompanied the two climbers with their projects.

programme.desc: After many months of preparation, on Sunday, 28th of August, the most legendary cycling event for amateur athletes and road cycling enthusiasts celebrates its 41th edition.

programme.title: SPAR Swiss Epic
programme.desc: From August 16 - 20, teams of two will compete in Switzerland’s pictures Graubünden region for the overall victory and important UCI mountain bike points at the Swiss Epic.

programme.desc: FIA Karting European ChampionshipsThis time we are in Sweden to have a look at a rather unusual motorsport event. Almost every motorsport pilot has started his carrer in a Kart. Let´s see how europe´s new pilot generation is doing on the scandinavian course.

programme.title: Profile - Nadine Wallner (Freeride Ski)
programme.desc: Get to know Austrian freeride queen Nadine Wallner. In this show the 2 times Freeride World Tour Champion takes us into untouched powder terrain and gives us a very personal view on what Freeriding means to her.

programme.title: Project 360 Grad
programme.desc: Project 360". Mammut wanted to allow the everyday alpine enthusiast to experience what it’s like to climb some of the most iconic routes in the world.

programme.title: Beni SpeedTransalp
programme.desc: Für die Strecke von Ruhpolding (GER) nach Kasern (ITA), 210 Kilometer und mehr als 10000 Höhenmeter, benötigen Freizeitsportler etwa fünf bis sieben Tage. Benedikt Böhm strebt die magische Zeitgrenze von 36 Stunden nonstop an.

programme.title: One Water Race 2024 52min
programme.desc: Das Konzept ist einfach: Wer von Arholma im Norden aus als Erster Landsort im Süden erreicht, wird zum Sieger gekürt. Laufen und Schwimmen sind die einzigen Fortbewegungsarten. Es gibt keine Streckenführung und freie Wahl der Route.

programme.title: World Rookie Tour Finals - Freestyle Ski and Snowboard
programme.desc: In der heutigen Episode gibt es die volle Dosis Freestyle Snowboarding und Skiing. Junge talentierte Athleten aus der ganzen Welt können bei den World Rookie Finals 2023 ihr Können unter Beweis stellen. Schauen wir uns das mal an!

programme.title: Winter Games New Zealand - Park Jam Team Challenge
programme.desc: Building on the success of the Big Air, get ready for the next thrilling New Zealand Winter Games episode, The Park Jam Team Challenge! Witness the fusion of skill and creativity as Freestyle Skiers and Snowboarders showcase their prowess in this high-energy competition.

programme.title: Winter Games New Zealand - Back Country Freestyle Challenge
programme.desc: Back to the third episode of the New Zealand Winter Games 2023! This time, we dive into the exhilarating world of Back Country Freestyle, where athletes shows their skills in the untouched winter landscapes in the southern Alps of New Zealand. Get ready for an adrenaline-packed adventure!

programme.title: Greenlandic
programme.desc: In today´s episode we have the ultimate journey into the heart of Greenland´s rich culture and untamed backcountry. Join us as we explore the breathtaking landcapes of this Artic wonderland. It´s the paradise for every passionate freeskier. Let´s check out!

programme.title: FIA Karting European Championship - Kristianstad (SWE)
programme.desc: FIA Karting European ChampionshipsThis time we are in Sweden to have a look at a rather unusual motorsport event. Almost every motorsport pilot has started his carrer in a Kart. Let´s see how europe´s new pilot generation is doing on the scandinavian course.

programme.title: World E-Bike Series 2022 Round 3 & 4
programme.desc: In todays Episode we´re traveling to France & Belgium for round 3 & 4 of the World E-Bike Series. The World’s best male & female mountain bikers are going to battle out who will take the lead in the middle of the racing calendar.

programme.title: Golden Fly Series 2022 - Schaan (LIE)
programme.desc: On September 11th, the world’s best long jumpers and pole vaulters took once again flight on a certified mobile athletics facility that enables the athletes to use the same runway.

programme.title: FIA Karting World Championships (KZ/KZ2)
programme.desc: The first of the two world championship events of the 2022 FIA Karting season offers a very attractive programme with five categories and more than 320 drivers taking part in Le Mans (FRA) from 1st to 4th September.

programme.title: World E-Bike Series 2022 Round 5 & 6
programme.desc: A long and exciting World E-Bike Series season enters its final two rounds in Girona and Barcelona. Who will be crowned the winner of the series this year? Let´s check out!

programme.title: The Art of Canyoning
programme.desc: The Art of Canyoning führt dem TV-Publikum diese junge Sportart vor. Spannung, Action, Natur und sportliches Können stehen auf dem Programm, wenn fünf der weltbesten Canyoning-Profis einige der schönsten Orte im Schweizer Kanton Tessin bezwingen.

programme.title: Die Kunst des Outdoorsports
programme.desc: In this show we follow the adidas Outdoor Sports Team for venturesome jumps, fast downhills and balancing acts in dizzy heights. Canyoning in Ticino and Unicycling and Highlining in the Dolomites are the highlights of this outstanding adventures show.

programme.title: The Barrel - Teil 1
programme.desc: Seit die erste Welle geritten wurde, haben Surfer Geschichten und Erfahrungen ausgetauscht, um zu versuchen, die Magie zu erklären, die in den Wellen steckt, die sie reiten.

programme.title: People in Motion
programme.desc: People of Motion is a sport documentary about a group of people who turn to parkour in their lives -- sometimes to get rid of frustration, sometimes just to feel the ground and be part of something.

programme.title: Simple Session 2024 - BMX Final
programme.desc: Simple Session wurde im Jahr 2000 ins Leben gerufen und hat sich von einem Kleinstadt-Wettbewerb zu einem der größten und renommiertesten BMX- und Skateboard-Wettbewerbe der Welt entwickelt. Die Simple Session 24 kehrt am 24.-25. August in ihre Heimatstadt Tartu zurück.

programme.title: Queen & King of the Court #04
programme.desc: The sands of Doha are set to witness the grand finale of the 2023 Queen & King of the Court Crown Series, marking the culmination of a thrilling series of events that kicked off in Miami earlier this year.

programme.title: Dream Job
programme.desc: A comedy documentary about a girl working in the ski industry who decides to become one of the stars: they go up, they go down, how difficult can it be? Needless to say, she finds out how hard it really can be.

programme.title: Reconnect One - USA
programme.desc: Sarka and Cheryl, who haven't seen each other in years, have decided to reunite and embark on a tour of their own. Having once traveled together on the contest scene for over 15 years, life led them to different corners of the West Coast of America.

programme.title: GKA World Tour Season Wrap Up
programme.desc: The Qatar Airways GKA Kite World Tour has just wrapped up a record-breaking year packed with drama and excitement. The stars of the sport pushed kiteboarding to new highs in 2023 in their single-minded quest for world titles.

programme.title: FIA Karting European Championship - Kristianstad (SWE)
programme.desc: FIA Karting European ChampionshipsThis time we are in Sweden to have a look at a rather unusual motorsport event. Almost every motorsport pilot has started his carrer in a Kart. Let´s see how europe´s new pilot generation is doing on the scandinavian course.

programme.title: Between Home
programme.desc: "Between Home" is an adventure documentary about Nick Jaffe. Nick decides to sail solo from the UK to Australia, negotiating the treacherous waters of the Pacific and Atlantic Oceans.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: The undisputed heavyweight king of kickboxing will be decided in the main event as long reigning champion Rico Verhoeven (60-10, 20 KO) goes up against arguably his most dangerous opponent to date in interim-heavyweight champ Tariq ‘Cookie’ Osaro (25-2-1, 13 KO). Middleweight champ Donovan Wisse (19-1, 10 KO) puts his title on the line against number one contender Michael Boapeah (16-3-1, 7 KO). Wisse has looked unstoppable so far during his title run but now he faces an in-form Michael Boapeah who holds a win over the only man to beat Wisse. The welterweight division sees top ranked stars go head-to-head as Hamicha (40-2, 30 KO) takes on Diaguely Camara (24-4-1, 10 KO) and Jay Overmeer...

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S00 : E01 GLORY Heavyweight Grand Prix 2024
programme.desc: 3 wins to come out on top, who's it going to be? Rico Verhoeven, Levi Rigters, Tarik Osaro, Benjamin Adegbuyi, Sofian Laidouni, Uku Jurjendal, Bahram Rajabzadeh, and Nabil Khachab pair up and throw down for the GLORY Heavyweight Grand Prix, an 8-man 1-night heavyweight tournament for the ages.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: Donovan Wisse (20-1, 10 KO) puts his middleweight championship on the line against number one contender Ulric Bokeme (32-4, 17 KO) in the main event of the evening. Wisse is one of the top P4P kickboxers on the planet today and is chasing his fourth straight title defense. After his Grand Prix heroics, the number one ranked heavyweight Levi Rigters (17-2, 8 KO) returns to action to take on dangerous late notice replacement Nico Pereira Horta (22-8, 3 KO) in the co-main event. The ‘King of The Hague’ crown is up for grabs when rivals Michael Boapeah (16-4-1, 7 KO) and Serkan Ozcaglayan (45-9, 36 KO) clash. The two top middleweights meet in this local derby match-up where the winner walks...

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S00 : E04 GLORY Light Heavyweight Grand Prix 2024
programme.desc: The eight-man one-night GLORY Light Heavyweight Grand Prix will crown the baddest light heavyweight striker on the planet. The eight participants are: GLORY champion, #C Tarik Khbabez (58-10-1, 28 KO), Morocco. Former champion, #1 Donegi Abena (27-10, 7 KO), Suriname. Former champion, #2 Sergej Maslobojev (38-6, 23 KO), Lithuania. Undefeated in GLORY, #3 Stefan Latescu (17-2, 8 KO), Romania. ‘Mister Cool’ #4 Ibrahim El Bouni (41-9-1, 22 KO), Morocco. The wild & unpredictable, #5 Bahram Rajabzadeh (67-2, 59 KO), Azerbaijan. Top French light heavyweight, #6 Pascal Toure (20-6, 7 KO), France. Veteran fighter, #7 Bogdan Stoica (58-14, 40 KO), Romania.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S00 : E01 GLORY Heavyweight Grand Prix 2024
programme.desc: 3 wins to come out on top, who's it going to be? programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: In the main event, former GLORY Featherweight Title Challenger Abraham Vidales will face Tomás Aguirre, a native of Argentina who has finished 22 of his 26 wins. In the co-main event, top-10 GLORY middleweight contender Ivan Galaz will meet Renan Altamiro. Also featured on the card, GLORY debutants Jonas Julio and Javier Aparicio will square off in a welterweight clash, and top-five GLORY featherweight contender Denis Wosik will go for his third consecutive victory as he takes on Marcos Rios. Additionally, top-ten GLORY lightweight contender Bruno Gazani will fight Nick Chasteen, and Tessa de Kom will replace Sarah Moussaddak (injury) and meet Giuliana Cosnard in a Super Bantamweight bout...

programme.title: GLORY 95 Prelims LIVE
programme.desc: The GLORY 95 prelims will be headlined by #3 LightWeight Guerric Billet as he takes on #10 LightWeight Andrej Kedves, and will feature a host of new talent all vying to make an impact in their respective GLORY debuts.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S00 : E04 GLORY Light Heavyweight Grand Prix 2024
programme.desc: The eight-man one-night GLORY Light Heavyweight Grand Prix will crown the baddest light heavyweight striker on the planet. The eight participants are: GLORY champion, #C Tarik Khbabez (58-10-1, 28 KO), Morocco. Former champion, #1 Donegi Abena (27-10, 7 KO), Suriname. Former champion, #2 Sergej Maslobojev (38-6, 23 KO), Lithuania. Undefeated in GLORY, #3 Stefan Latescu (17-2, 8 KO), Romania. ‘Mister Cool’ #4 Ibrahim El Bouni (41-9-1, 22 KO), Morocco. The wild & unpredictable, #5 Bahram Rajabzadeh (67-2, 59 KO), Azerbaijan. Top French light heavyweight, #6 Pascal Toure (20-6, 7 KO), France. Veteran fighter, #7 Bogdan Stoica (58-14, 40 KO), Romania.

programme.desc: Tara LaRosa is a former student of all-world fighter Royce Gracie. She takes on perhaps the only woman who has a fighting chance to put the hurt on her...Amanda Buckner.

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: Ultimate Warrior Challenge is one of Europe's leading MMA shows, since it's inception in 2006 it's has grown steadily and delivered some of the most exciting MMA fights Europe has seen, with a truly Internationalfight roster, UWC has built a solid reputation for bringing some of the Worlds toughest fighters to square off in the UWC octagon, fighters from the UK, USA, Brazil, Sweden, Italy, Africa, Poland, France, Cyprus, Greece have all fought in the UWC cage.

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: This is heavyweight fighting at its best and bloodiest. Finnish muay thai champion Jarno Nurminen makes his mised martial art debut against Korean judo expert Sag Su Lee. And in one of the sport's best brawls, Roy Nelson goes toe-to-toe with Josh Curran.

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: World renowned jiu-jitsu expert Rodrigo Damm takes on the hard hitting 'Black Mamba'. And wrestler Mike Brown takes on Yves Edwards, a veteran of the UFC and Pride.

programme.title: DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.desc: Mike Short comes from a history of street fighting and recognizes the importance of training and discipline. He has been coaching Boxing for many years and relishes the fact that his entire family comes together at his events, run out of Dekada Gym.

programme.title: DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.desc: Jesse Arnett attributes most of his success to his coaches, in particular Jake Peacock. Jake was born with only a partial arm. This coach and fighter doesn't let that stop him from training some of the best athletes in the world.

programme.title: DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.desc: Coaches in fight sport are at times an underrated but yet intergral part of an athlete's success. What makes them give up their day, weeks and years to help their fighters be the best in the world? This episode features Craig Wilson as we delve into the life of a coach.

programme.title: OUT OF THE CAGE
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 OUT OF THE CAGE
programme.desc: Ukraine born Anton Tokarchuck is known for his massive knock outs. At HK35, he takes on Jesse Day Rider - a fighter who has never been knocked out. Anton has worked incredibly hard at the gym for this and is looking to continue his knock out winning streak.

programme.title: OUT OF THE CAGE
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 OUT OF THE CAGE
programme.desc: Coming from a history of drinking heavily and drug abuse, Nick Burnham was able to turn his life around completely by prioritizing his MMA training. Now, at HK38, Nick is looking to take the Lightweight title away from Dauda Keita in a fight that goes the distance!

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: MMA Veteran Nick Thompson goes up against the brute force of wrestling star Davion Peterson. Thompson has more pro fight experience than anyone on the first series, and will need all of it to hold his own against the relentless Peterson.

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: In a showdown between the winners from Series 1 and the powerhouse Russian Red Devils, Mario Rinaldi is in tough against Sergey Kaznovski. The Russian is reknowned for short, brutal fights, earning him a reputation as the king of the 1st round KO. This is not the first time Trevor Pragley and Andrei Semenov have met in the ring. Last time, Semenov was battered into submission, so he come into this fight hungry for revenge.

programme.title: DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH

programme.desc: See how a current fighter balances his own training and UFC aspirations with his life as a coach, trying to help others pursue their fight dreams. We follow Hard Knocks fighter Keegan Oliver through a day in his life as a Coach.
